001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionInput;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutPoint;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput;
008import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
009import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
010
011/**
012 * Immutable data for a transaction input.
013 * See also {@link RawTransactionSigningRequest.RawInput} which can hold an incomplete transaction input, like
014 * those sent in the {@code signtransactionwithwallet} JSON-RPC request.
015 */
016public interface TransactionInputData {
017    Coin amount();
018
019    /**
020     * prevOut ScriptPubKey
021     */
022    Script script();
023
024    /**
025     * This probably shouldn't be here but is needed for proper operation with bitcoinj
026     * @return A Transaction "outpoint" pointing to the utxo this input will spend.
027     */
028    TransactionOutPoint toOutPoint();
029
030    Utxo toUtxo();
031
032    /**
033     * Create from a UTXO that paid to an address the intended signer can redeem
034     */
035    static TransactionInputData of(Utxo.Signable utxo, Address address) {
036        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(utxo.txId(), utxo.index(), utxo.amount(), ScriptBuilder.createOutputScript(address));
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Create from a UTXO that paid to a script the intended signer can redeem
041     * @param utxo Complete UTXO info
042     * @return input ready for signing
043     */
044    static TransactionInputData of(Utxo.Complete utxo) {
045        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(utxo.txId(), utxo.index(), utxo.amount(), utxo.scriptPubKey());
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Create an unsigned transaction input from an unspent transaction output that the signer can redeem
050     * @param out An unspent transaction output
051     * @return transaction input data
052     */
053    static TransactionInputData fromTxOut(TransactionOutput out) {
054        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(out.getParentTransactionHash(), out.getIndex(), out.getValue(), out.getScriptPubKey());
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Create an unsigned transaction input from a bitcoinj (unsigned) TransactionInput.
059     * @param input A transaction input (typically/currently unsigned)
060     * @return transaction input data
061     */
062    static TransactionInputData fromTxInput(TransactionInput input) {
063        return new TransactionInputDataUtxo(
064                input.getOutpoint().hash(),
065                (int) input.getOutpoint().index(),
066                input.getValue(),
067                input.getScriptSig());
068    }
069}
